verses.verse: לַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> everything זְמָ֑ן <S%H2165><s%> To every [thing there is] a season וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חֵ֖פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> to every purpose תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> under the heaven ס

עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> A time לָלֶ֖דֶת <S%H3205><s%> to be born וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> to die עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> a time לָטַ֔עַת <S%H5193><s%> to plant וְעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לַעֲק֥וֹר <S%H6131><s%> to pluck up נָטֽוּעַ׃ <S%H5193><s%> [that which is] planted

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> A time לַהֲרוֹג֙ <S%H2026><s%> to kill וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לִרְפּ֔וֹא <S%H7495><s%> to heal עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> a time לִפְר֖וֹץ <S%H6555><s%> to break down וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1129><s%> to build up

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> A time לִבְכּוֹת֙ <S%H1058><s%> to weep וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לִשְׂח֔וֹק <S%H7832><s%> to laugh עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> a time סְפ֖וֹד <S%H5594><s%> to mourn וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time רְקֽוֹד׃ <S%H7540><s%> to dance

עֵ֚ת <S%H6256><s%> A time לְהַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> to cast away אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> stones וְעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time כְּנ֣וֹס <S%H3664><s%> together אֲבָנִ֑ים <S%H68><s%> stones עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> a time לַחֲב֔וֹק <S%H2263><s%> to embrace וְעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לִרְחֹ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> to refrain מֵחַבֵּֽק׃ <S%H2263><s%> from embracing

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> A time לְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <S%H1245><s%> to get וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לְאַבֵּ֔ד <S%H6><s%> to lose עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> a time לִשְׁמ֖וֹר <S%H8104><s%> to keep וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לְהַשְׁלִֽיךְ׃ <S%H7993><s%> to cast away

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> A time לִקְר֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H7167><s%> to rend וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לִתְפּ֔וֹר <S%H8609><s%> to sew עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> a time לַחֲשׁ֖וֹת <S%H2814><s%> to keep silence וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> to speak

עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> A time לֶֽאֱהֹב֙ <S%H157><s%> to love וְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time לִשְׂנֹ֔א <S%H8130><s%> to hate עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> a time מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> and a time שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> of peace ס

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יִּתְרוֹן֙ <S%H3504><s%> What profit הָֽעוֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> hath he that worketh בַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> in that wherein ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עָמֵֽל׃ <S%H6001><s%> that labors

רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעִנְיָ֗ן <S%H6045><s%> the travail אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> which God לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the sons הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of men לַעֲנ֥וֹת <S%H6031><s%> to be exercised בּֽוֹ׃

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> everything עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> He hath made יָפֶ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> every [thing] beautiful בְעִתּ֑וֹ <S%H6256><s%> in his time גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> has also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> the world נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> also he hath set בְּלִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> in their heart מִבְּלִ֞י <S%H1097><s%> so that אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> can find out הָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> no man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֛ה <S%H4639><s%> the work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> maketh הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> that God מֵרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> from the beginning וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even סֽוֹף׃ <S%H5490><s%> to the end

יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> that [there is] no good בָּ֑ם כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לִשְׂמ֔וֹחַ <S%H8055><s%> in them but for [a man] to rejoice וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and to do ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בְּחַיָּֽיו׃ <S%H2416><s%> in his life

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> moreover כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> And also that every man שֶׁיֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> should eat וְשָׁתָ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> and drink וְרָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> and enjoy ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> the good בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲמָל֑וֹ <S%H5999><s%> of all his labour מַתַּ֥ת <S%H4991><s%> it [is] the gift אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> I

יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> doeth הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> that whatsoever God ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will remain לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> it shall be for ever עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> nothing לְהוֹסִ֔יף <S%H3254><s%> can be put וּמִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is nothing לִגְרֹ֑עַ <S%H1639><s%> to it nor any thing taken וְהָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> from it and God עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> doeth שֶׁיִּֽרְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> [it] that [men] should fear מִלְּפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> is has שֶּֽׁהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> been כְּבָ֣ר <S%H3528><s%> That which hath been is now ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> and that וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> been כְּבָ֣ר <S%H3528><s%> and that which is to be hath already הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> been וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> been and God יְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> requireth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִרְדָּֽף׃ <S%H7291><s%> that which is past

וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Furthermore רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> And moreover I saw תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun מְק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place הַמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there הָרֶ֔שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> [that] wickedness וּמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> [was] there and the place הַצֶּ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness שָׁ֥מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there הָרָֽשַׁע׃ <S%H7562><s%> [that] iniquity

אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <S%H559><s%> I said אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I בְּלִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> in mine heart אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצַּדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> the righteous וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked יִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> shall judge הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> for [there is] a time לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חֵ֔פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> there for every purpose וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> and for every work שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> is there

אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <S%H559><s%> I said אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I בְּלִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> in mine heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דִּבְרַת֙ <S%H1700><s%> concerning the estate בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of men לְבָרָ֖ם <S%H1305><s%> might manifest הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> that God וְלִרְא֕וֹת <S%H7200><s%> them and that they might see שְׁהֶם־ <S%H1992><s%> that they בְּהֵמָ֥ה <S%H929><s%> themselves are beasts הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For מִקְרֶ֨ה <S%H4745><s%> For that which befalleth בְֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons הָאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> of men וּמִקְרֶ֣ה <S%H4745><s%> befalleth הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> beasts וּמִקְרֶ֤ה <S%H4745><s%> befalleth אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> even one thing לָהֶ֔ם כְּמ֥וֹת <S%H4194><s%> them as the one dieth זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> the other כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> so dieth זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> the other וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> breath אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> yea they have all one לַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> all וּמוֹתַ֨ר <S%H4195><s%> hath no preeminence הָאָדָ֤ם <S%H120><s%> so that a man מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> over הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> above a beast אָ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> and there כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> for all הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> for all [is] vanity

הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> All הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> All go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> unto one הַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> All הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הֶֽעָפָ֔ר <S%H6083><s%> all are of the dust וְהַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all שָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הֶעָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> to dust

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יוֹדֵ֗עַ <S%H3045><s%> Who knoweth ר֚וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man הָעֹלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> that goeth הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he לְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> upward וְר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> and the spirit הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> of the beast הַיֹּרֶ֥דֶת <S%H3381><s%> that goeth הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he לְמַ֥טָּה <S%H4295><s%> downward לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> I

וְרָאִ֗יתִי <S%H7200><s%> Wherefore I perceive כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> nothing טוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> that [there is] nothing better מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִשְׂמַ֤ח <S%H8055><s%> should rejoice הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> than that a man בְּֽמַעֲשָׂ֔יו <S%H4639><s%> in his own works כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> that חֶלְק֑וֹ <S%H2506><s%> for that [is] his portion כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who יְבִיאֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> for who shall bring לִרְא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> him to see בְּמֶ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> what שֶׁיִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will occur אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> what shall be after
